Headline: 95-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95-bound Red  Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95-bound Red  Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
